name: Mariusz Jan Skobel
profile_summary:
Senior Fullstack Engineer with 10+ years of experience in creating high-performance software solutions in healthcare and finance. Expertise in **Ruby**, **Rails**, and **Vue.js**, complemented by an extensive background in full-stack development using **JavaScript/TypeScript**, **Python**, **React**, **Next.js**, **Node.js**, **FastAPI**, and **Django**. Proficient in database management with **PostgreSQL** and implementing robust security frameworks like **RBAC** and **ABAC**. Experienced in designing and building distributed systems that utilize caching strategies and ensure service-to-service communication within a zero-trust architecture.

Strong abilities in agile methodologies and collaboration, enabling efficient team dynamics and project delivery. Proven track record in leading the development of enterprise platforms with AI/ML capabilities for analytics and automation, while ensuring compliance with standards such as HIPAA and PCI DSS. Possesses practical knowledge in MLOps using tools like MLflow, Airflow, and Kubeflow, and is passionate about driving real-world impact through technically sound and secure solutions.

experience.responsibilities:
• Developed and maintained scalable, full-stack applications using **Ruby on Rails** and **Vue.js**, ensuring agile methodologies and collaboration among cross-functional teams.
• Implemented Role-Based Access Control (RBAC) and Attribute-Based Access Control (ABAC) strategies to enhance security for user authentication and authorization in distributed systems.
• Designed and optimized caching strategies to improve application performance and reduce latency, successfully achieving a **30% reduction** in response time for user requests.
• Built service-to-service communication layers that adhere to zero-trust principles, ensuring enhanced security and integrity of inter-service interactions.
• Leveraged **PostgreSQL** for data management and optimized database schemas for efficient data storage, retrieval, and querying, handling over **1 million** records seamlessly.
• Collaborated on threat modeling exercises to identify potential vulnerabilities and implement mitigation strategies, fostering a culture of security-first development.
• Participated in code reviews and contributed to the design of CI/CD pipelines, pushing for continuous integration and delivery of high-quality software products.
• Led team efforts using **Cedar** and **Rego** to enforce policy-based management, improving compliance and access governance across applications.
• Engaged in agile rituals, including sprint planning, daily stand-ups, and retrospectives, to enhance project efficiency and team cohesion.

• Enhanced financial platforms by adopting **RBAC** and **ABAC** strategies to implement fine-grained access control and improve security in vulnerable areas.
• Developed scalable applications using **Ruby on Rails**, contributing to the modernization efforts that improved maintenability and throughput for high-volume transaction systems.
• Built responsive front-end applications with **Vue.js** (version 3), utilizing caching strategies to enhance performance and user experience for financial dashboards and admin portals.
• Designed and implemented distributed systems for transaction monitoring and analytics, integrating **PostgreSQL** for data storage and retrieval to support high transaction volumes.
• Collaborated in an **agile** environment to foster communication and streamline project tasks, improving project delivery timelines by **30%**.
• Conducted **threat modeling** sessions to identify vulnerabilities, enhancing the robustness of the architecture and enforcing a **zero-trust** security model throughout the development lifecycle.
• Improved service-to-service communication using **Cedar** policies, ensuring secure and efficient interaction among microservices in the environment.

Developed and optimized web applications using **Ruby on Rails** and **Vue.js**, ensuring efficient service-to-service communication and enhanced performance across distributed systems.
Implemented role-based access control (RBAC) and attribute-based access control (ABAC) strategies to provide a zero-trust security model, safeguarding user interactions and ensuring compliance with GDPR.
Engineered robust caching strategies across the platform with **Redis** and **PostgreSQL**, significantly improving load times and data retrieval speeds by **30%**.
Facilitated Agile methodologies within cross-functional teams to foster collaboration and drive efficient project delivery, achieving a **15%** increase in deployment frequency.
Performed extensive threat modeling to identify potential vulnerabilities, systematically strengthening the application architecture against security risks throughout the development lifecycle.
Designed and built responsive, mobile-first applications employing **Vue.js** and **HTML5/CSS3** with a strong focus on accessibility compliance (WCAG 2.1), enhancing user engagement metrics by **25%**.
Managed deployment strategies utilizing **Cedar** for streamlined environments, supporting faster integration and continuous delivery workflows.
Optimized backend services to ensure high availability and scalability, addressing real-time data requests and supporting up to **10,000** concurrent users without degradation of performance.
Conducted code reviews and provided mentorship within the engineering team, fostering an environment of knowledge sharing and continuous improvement.
